title: Lady of the Manor
description: Born into wealth and privilege, you manage estates and command respect through charm and wit.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Charisma, Access to Noble Estates.

title: Iron Matron
description: A tough, no-nonsense woman who has carved out her own place in the male-dominated world of industry.

title: Gentleman's Duelist
description: Trained in the art of fencing and honor-bound combat, you uphold a code of chivalry and skill.

title: Street Urchin Queen
description: Growing up on the streets, you've learned to command the respect of other outcasts, using your wits and cunning.

title: Military Captain
description: A decorated officer with a tactical mind, known for leading troops into battle with bravery.

title: Enchantress
description: A woman skilled in the magical arts, using beauty and arcane power to influence those around you.

title: Master Craftsman
description: An expert artisan, known for producing the finest goods in the land, blending skill with ingenuity.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Crafting Skills, Access to Master Workshops.

title: Arcane Maiden
description: Young but powerful, you have dedicated your life to mastering the arcane arts.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Magic Skills, Access to Arcane Libraries.

title: Guildmaster
description: A respected leader in the business world, you manage trade and commerce with a firm hand.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Acumen, Access to Business Networks.

title: High Priestess
description: A revered spiritual leader, using your faith to inspire and guide your followers.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Faith Skills, Access to Sacred Sites.
